ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let resultData = JSON.parse(result);

let targetData = resultData.data || resultData.list || resultData.book_list || 
                resultData.publication_list || resultData.result || resultData;
                
if (targetData != null && targetData.book_shelf_info) {
    let bookIds = targetData.book_shelf_info.map(item => `{"book_id": "${item.book_id}"}`).join(',');
    
    let booksData = java.ajax(
`https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{"method": "post","body": {"books":[${bookIds}]}}`
        );
    
    let books = JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
        let d = books[i];
        list.push({
            src: d,
            book_name: d.book_name,
            author: d.author,
            category:d.category,
            tags:d.tags,
            word_number:d.word_number,
            lastChapterTitle: d.last_chapter_title,
            abstract: d.abstract,
            book_id: d.book_id,
        });
    }
} else {
    list = targetData.content || targetData;
}

JSON.stringify({data: list})
</js>
data.data||data.list||book_list||data.publication_list||data.result||data

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
m=java.get("m");
if(baseUrl.match(/fanqx/)){
var a = baseUrl.match(/\/chapter\/(.*?)\.html/);
//java.log(a[1]);
let hrefList = [];
if (a) {
  var b = result.match(/data\-p\="\d+"/g).length;
  if (b) {
    for(let i = 1; i <= b; i++) {
      let href = `https://www.fanqxsw.com/index.php?action=loadChapterPage,{"body":"id=${a[1]}&page=${i}","method":"POST"}`;
     //java.log(href);
      hrefList.push(href);
    }
    hrefList
     }
}
}else {
list=[]
if(JSON.parse(result).data.length>0){
	for (i = 2; i <= m; i++){
	list.push(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/,'page=' +i))
		}
		list
	}
	}

</js>

};

bjson = JSON.stringify(bd);
url + ',' + bjson;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
result = JSON.parse(result)
resultlength = result.length
for (var i=0; i<resultlength; resultlength--){
 let chapter = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api.kadokado.com.tw/v2/collection/withIsPurchased?publishedOnly=true&collectionId=" + result[resultlength - 1]["id"].match(/\d+/)[0]))
 Array.prototype.splice.apply(result, [resultlength, 0].concat(chapter))
 }
for (var i = 0; i < result.length; i++) {
  if (!isNaN(result[i].id)) {
  result[i].id = "https://api.kadokado.com.tw/v2/chapter/" + result[i].id
  } else {
  result[i].id = ""
  }
 if (result[i].hasOwnProperty('free')) {
 result[i].free = !result[i].free
 }
}
result = result
</js>

<js>
let txt = "";
let regex = /PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g;
let match;

while ((match = regex.exec(result)) !== null) {
    let base64 = match[0].replace(/[^A-Za-z0-9\+\/\=]/g, "");
    txt += java.base64Decode(base64) + "\n";
}

if (txt.trim() === "") {
    let html = java.webView(null, baseUrl, null);
    txt = java.getString(".word_read@p!-1@html", html)
}

txt;
</js>

var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);

    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var arr = baseUrl.split('/');
var songtype = arr[3];
var songid = arr[4].split('.')[0];
/*
var data = java.ajax("http://service.5sing.kugou.com/song/getSongUrl?version=6.6.70&songid=" + songid + "&songtype=" + songtype);
data = JSON.parse(data).data
data.squrl || data.hqurl || data.lqurl;
*/
	
let params = {
  appid: 3146,
  clienttime: Math.ceil(Date.now() / 1000),
  clientver: 610850,
  dfid: "-",
  from: "com.sing.client.player",
  mid: 114514,
  songfields: "ID,SN,SK,SW,SS,ST,SI,CT,M,S,ZQ,WO,ZC,HY,YG,CK,D,RQ,DD,E,R,RC,SG,C,CS,LV,LG,SY,UID,PT,SCSR,SC,KM5",
  songid: songid,
  songtype: songtype,
  token: "",
  userfields: "ID,NN,I,YCRQ,FCRQ",
  uuid: "-"
}

let signstr = ""
let keys = Object.keys(params).sort()
for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
  signstr += `${keys[i]}=${params[keys[i]]}`
}
let signature = java.md5Encode("UqgPMZpjgRZQ7s8JAuUIP5DQdo5O5NB" + signstr + "UqgPMZpjgRZQ7s8JAuUIP5DQdo5O5NB")

let querys = []
for (let i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
  querys.push(`${keys[i]}=${params[keys[i]]}`.replace(/\,/g, "%2c"))
}
let querystr = querys.join("&") + "&signature=" + signature
let request = java.ajax("https://5sapi.kugou.com/song/getSongUrl?" + querystr)
// java.log(request)
let data = JSON.parse(request).data
data.squrl || data.squrl_backup || data.hqurl || data.hqurl_backup || data.lqurl || data.lqurl_backup
</js>
